argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_nnz | |- ( N e. NN -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 2 |  | #P_nnne0 | |- ( N e. NN -> N =/= 0 ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_jca | |- ( N e. NN -> ( N e. ZZ /\ N =/= 0 ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_pczdvds | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ ( N e. ZZ /\ N =/= 0 ) ) -> ( P ^ ( P pCnt N ) ) || N ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ N e. NN ) -> ( P ^ ( P pCnt N ) ) || N ) |
